title: Next.js Dashboard
description: A dashboard application built with React and Next.js

sections.content: This project is a Next.js dashboard that I developed as part of the Next.js documentation. The dashboard is built using Next.js, React, TypeScript, and Tailwind. The dashboard includes a public home page, a login page, dashboard pages, and invoice management.

This project was a valuable learning experience for me. I learned how to use Next.js to build a complex web application. I also learned how to use React, TypeScript, and Tailwind to build a production-ready application.
